content: size xl k1 *k2tog k1 k2tog 4times repeat from * to last st k1 56 sts next round *k1 p1 repeat from * across all sts repeat last round till ribbing measures 1 2 5 cm then bind off loosely in rib pattern note i did change to a smaller needle for the ribbing at the cuff as i wanted to draw it in from the wider sleeve weave in ends and block lightly row 1 *k3 yo sk2p yo repeat from * across round row 2 4 6 8 knits all sts row 3 5 7 same as row 1
